7.2 The Transcendentals module

$single-pi

Constant

Summary

The value of p as a single precision floating point number.

Type

<single-float>

Superclass

<float>

Library

common-extensions

Module

transcendentals

Description

The value of p as a single precision floating point number.

See also

See the constant $double-pi, page 174.
